00016 void GPIO_Init(int GPIO, int direction){
00017         int port = GPIO / 100;
00018         int channel = GPIO % 100;
00019         switch (port){
00020                    int bitmask;
00021                    case 0:  bitmask = ~(0x3 << (channel % 16 * 2));
00022                                     if (channel <= 15)
00023                                            PINSEL0 &= bitmask;
00024                                     else
00025                                            PINSEL1 &= bitmask;
00026                                     if (direction == INPUT)
00027                                            IO0DIR &= (0xFFFFFFFF & (~(1 << channel)));
00028                                     else
00029                                            IO0DIR |= 1 << channel;
00030                                         break;
00031                                         
00032                         case 1: if ((channel >= 16) && (channel <= 25)) 
00033                                            PINSEL2 &= 0xFFFFFFF7;
00034                                         else
00035                                            PINSEL2 &= 0xFFFFFFFB;
00036                                         if (direction == INPUT)
00037                                            IO1DIR &= (0xFFFFFFFF & (~(1 << channel)));
00038                                         else
00039                                                 IO1DIR |= 1 << channel;
00040                                         break;
00041         }
00042         
00043 }

00052 int GPIO_Read(int GPIO){
00053         int port = GPIO / 100;
00054         int channel = GPIO % 100;
00055         if(channel > 32) return -1;
00056         switch(port){
00057                  case 0: return (IO0PIN >> channel) & 0x1; 
00058                  case 1: return (IO1PIN >> channel) & 0x1;      
00059         }
00060         return -1;
00061 }
00062 
00069 void GPIO_Set(int GPIO, int value){
00070         int port = GPIO / 100;
00071         int channel = GPIO % 100;
00072         if(channel > 32) return ;
00073         switch(port){
00074        case 0: switch(value){
00075                                    case 0: IO0CLR |= (1 << channel); break;
00076                                    case 1: IO0SET |= (1 << channel); break;
00077                            }
00078                            break;
00079            case 1: switch(value){
00080                                    case 0: IO1CLR |= (1 << channel); break;
00081                                    case 1: IO1SET |= (1 << channel); break;
00082                            }
00083            break;
00084         }
00085 }
